# text(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a badge displaying a text.

## Declaration

```swift
static func text(_ text: String) -> NSItemBadge
```

## Parameters

- **text**: The text to be displayed inside the badge.

## Return Value

A new `NSItemBadge` instance with the specified text.
